name: change_alarm_state
description: Change the state of one or more specified alarms, or change the state of all alarms in bulk.

alarm_ids.description: A list of unique identifiers for the alarms to modify.

time_of_day.description: Time of the day of the alarm in strict HH:MM:SS format (e.g., '13:30:00', '01:00:00').

am_pm_or_unknown.description: Specifies the time period as `AM`, `PM`, or `UNKNOWN`.

label.description: The label of the alarm to be modified.

state_operation.description: The operation to perform on the alarm's state.

date.description: The date of the alarm to modify.

start_date.description: Filters for alarms scheduled on or after this date.

end_date.description: Filters for alarms scheduled to fire on or before this date.

bulk_operation.description: Specifies whether to apply the state change to all alarms.

name: change_timer_state
description: Changes the state of one or more timers (e.g., resume, pause, reset, cancel, stop).

timer_ids.description: A list of IDs for the timers to modify.

timer_type.description: The type of the timer, which must be `UPCOMING`, `PAUSED`, or `RUNNING`.

duration.description: The duration of the timer to modify.

label.description: The label of the timer to modify.

state_operation.description: The state change operation to perform, such as `resume`, `pause`, `reset`, `cancel`, or `delete`.

bulk_operation.description: Specifies whether to apply the state change to all timers.

name: create_alarm
description: Creates a new alarm for a specific time or after a given duration.

duration.description: Duration of the alarm. Format: "<hours>h<minutes>m<seconds>s", e.g., "5h30m20s", "10m", "2m15s", "5h", or "45s". Any combination of these units is allowed, but the total duration must be greater than 0 seconds.

recurrence.description: A list of one or more days for recurrence, such as `SUNDAY` or `MONDAY`.

name: create_clock
description: Creates a new timer or alarm.

type.description: The type of the clock component; must be `TIMER` or `ALARM`.

duration.description: Duration of the timer or alarm. Format: "<hours>h<minutes>m<seconds>s", e.g., "5h30m20s", "10m", "2m15s", "5h", or "45s". Any combination of these units is allowed, but the total duration must be greater than 0 seconds.

time_of_day.description: Time of day in strict HH:MM:SS format (e.g., '13:30:00', '01:00:00').

label.description: A descriptive label for the timer or alarm.

recurrence.description: A list of strings specifying the recurrence pattern for the alarm.

name: create_timer
description: Creates a new timer to go off after a given duration or at a specific time.

duration.description: Duration of the timer. Format: "<hours>h<minutes>m<seconds>s", e.g., "5h30m20s", "10m", "2m15s", "5h", or "45s". Any combination of these units is allowed, but the total duration must be greater than 0 seconds.

time.description: Time of day for the timer to fire, in the 12-hour format `H[:M[:S]]`.

label.description: An optional, descriptive label for the timer.

name: modify_alarm
description: Modify one or more existing alarms.

query.description: The time of day or label of the alarm to modify.

alarm_type.description: The type of alarm to modify.

new_time_of_day.description: The new time of the day in strict HH:MM:SS format (e.g., '13:30:00', '01:00:00').

new_am_pm_or_unknown.description: The new period of the day: `AM`, `PM`, or `UNKNOWN`.

alarm_ids.description: A list of IDs for the alarms to be modified.

duration_to_add.description: Duration to add to the alarm.

date.description: The date of the alarm to modify.

new_date.description: The new date for the alarm.

new_recurrence.description: The new recurrence pattern for the alarm.

bulk_operation.description: Specifies whether to apply the modification to all alarms.

name: modify_alarm_v2
description: Modifies the label, time, or state of one or more alarms.

filters.description: A dictionary of key-value pairs to identify the alarms to modify.

modifications.description: A dictionary of attributes to modify, such as `label`, `time`, `date`, `recurrence`, `duration_to_add`, or `state_operation`.

bulk_operation.description: Required to be `True` to modify multiple alarms when the provided `filters` match more than one.

name: modify_timer
description: Modify a timer's duration or label.

query.description: The duration or label of the timer to modify.

timer_type.description: The type of timer to modify, which must be `UPCOMING`, `PAUSED`, or `RUNNING`.

new_duration.description: The new duration to set for the timer.

duration_to_add.description: Amount of time to add to the timer's current duration.

new_label.description: The new label for the timer.

timer_ids.description: A list of timer IDs to modify.

bulk_operation.description: Specifies if the modification applies to all timers.

name: modify_timer_v2
description: Modify a timer's or multiple timers' label, duration, or state.

filters.description: A dictionary of criteria for identifying the timers to modify.

modifications.description: A dictionary of modifications to apply, where keys can be `label`, `duration`, `duration_to_add`, or `state_operation` (e.g., 'PAUSE', 'RESUME', 'DELETE').

bulk_operation.description: When `true`, applies modifications to all timers matching the `filters`.

name: show_matching_alarms
description: Retrieves alarms that match specified criteria.

query.description: The exact time or label of the alarm.

alarm_type.description: The type of alarm to show; can be `UPCOMING`, `DISABLED`, or `ACTIVE`.

alarm_ids.description: A list of alarm IDs to retrieve.

date.description: The date to show alarms for, formatted as `YYYY-MM-DD`.

start_date.description: A filter for alarms scheduled to fire on or after this date, in `YYYY-MM-DD` format.

end_date.description: Filters for alarms scheduled to fire on or before this date, formatted as `YYYY-MM-DD`.

name: show_matching_timers
description: Retrieves and lists timers that match the specified filters.

query.description: The duration, time of day, or label of the timer.

timer_ids.description: A list of timer IDs to show.

name: show_stopwatch
description: Shows the current state of the stopwatch.

time.description: The time to snooze until in 12-hour `H[:M[:S]]` format.

duration.description: The number of seconds to snooze the alarm.

name: snooze_alarm
description: Snooze an alarm that has fired.

snooze_duration.description: The snooze duration in seconds, provided as a string.

snooze_till_time_of_day.description: The time of day to snooze the alarm until in strict HH:MM:SS format (e.g., '13:30:00', '01:00:00').

am_pm_or_unknown.description: Specifies the period of the day, which must be `AM`, `PM`, or `UNKNOWN`.
